Text: thanks for the pics that show its about American football and not the rest of the (sad )world kind..you don't know what yer missing you foreigners,(not that there is anything wrong with that)
Having watched it ...It's a GREAT real look at an American high school football team and what a coaches love and determination can do to make an impoverished bunch of loser into glorious winners

I really didnt get what others wrote in their comments on here - this was about men making boys into men- color had no bearing- the way it should be - sports is about TEAM - it doesnt build character - it gives u the oppurtunity to show what character u hav inside u as a man.  Thanks so much for upload - wish life was more in tune to things like this but unfortunately its not and that is why we r where we r as a nation and world right now.  It was a pleasure - thank you so much for a lil glimpse of hope.  USAFspec. retired
